page.title: 12COACHES FROM HOGNASTON
page.content: Stationed in the village of Hognaston is the small coach firm "Websters". The firm dates back to the 1700s when as a transport company packhorses were used.The present owner bought the firm from Websters about 13years ago. The firm has 4 coaches and 1 mini-bus. Apart from the owner there are two full time drivers, one part-time, and a garage mechanic who services and repairs the coaches. The coaches are kept in a garage on the outskirts of the village.In the garage are stored spare parts,wheels, tyres and the tools needed to keep the buses in good running order.
